{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''Bêth''' is an [[Adûnaic]] word for "saying" or "expression", or sometimes used as an agentive "sayer, speaker". 
==Etymology==
[[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[BITH]].

It is obviously a loan from [[Sindarin]] ''[[peth]]''.
==Example==
* [[Inzilbêth]]
*[[saibêth]]
*[[izindu-bêth]]
==See also==
*[[barabatta]]
